title: President Donald J. Trump Is Launching America’s Space Force – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Infrastructure & Technology	

Issued on:
October 23, 2018
Our destiny, beyond the Earth, is not only a matter of national identity, but a matter of national security.
						President Donald J. Trump					FORMING SPACE FORCE: To safeguard American dominance in space, President Donald J. Trump is working to form a Space Force as a sixth branch of the Armed Forces.  PREPARING FOR THE THREATS OF THE 21ST CENTURY: President Trump is preparing our military to protect against the wide range of challenges we face today, including in space. RENEWING AMERICAN LEADERSHIP IN SPACE: President Trump is keeping his promise to restore America’s legacy of leadership in space
